meanings.definition: A type of diesel engine commonly used in trucks and heavy machinery.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic fixed the cummins in the truck.
meanings.sent2: The cummins in the tractor roared to life.
meanings.sent3: The cummins engine decided to take a nap in the middle of the highway.
meanings.sent4: The cummins purred like a contented cat as the truck accelerated.
meanings.sent5: The cummins engine hummed with power as it pulled the heavy load effortlessly.

meanings.sent1: Mr. Cummins greeted us warmly at the door.
meanings.sent2: The Cummins family has a long history in this town.
meanings.sent3: The Cummins clan organized a surprise party for their grandmother.
meanings.sent4: The Cummins name stood out on the list of attendees.
meanings.sent5: Cummins was written in elegant script on the mailbox.

meanings.definition: A type of plant or tree.
meanings.sent1: The cummins in the garden bloomed beautifully in spring.
meanings.sent2: The cummins tree provided shade for the picnic.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hid its acorns in the cummins leaves.
meanings.sent4: The cummins plant stood tall among the other flowers.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the cummins filled the air with sweetness.
